timeline.bodyText: Lots of parameters in the constructor - looks like a good candidate for the Builder pattern
timeline.author: dsilvam
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -28,13 +31,15 @@
      * @param allowExtraParameters
      */
     public AppDescriptorImpl(final String fileName,
+            final boolean systemApp,
             final String name,
             final String description,
             final String iconUrl,
             final Boolean allowExtraParameters,
             final Map<String, ParamDescriptor> params) {
         super(name, description, iconUrl, allowExtraParameters, params);

replies.bodyText:
This constructor is public for the sake of being used by the DataGen (which is really a builder)
The real constructor is this:
 AppDescriptorImpl(final String fileName, final boolean systemApp, final AppSchema appSchema)
It only takes 3 params. I am marking this constructor as@VivisbleForTesting
replies.author: fabrizzio-dotCMS

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/security/apps/AppDescriptorImpl.java b/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/security/apps/AppDescriptorImpl.java
index e9bfadb5f7..5bbcf57a2b 100644
--- a/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/security/apps/AppDescriptorImpl.java
+++ b/dotCMS/src/main/java/com/dotcms/security/apps/AppDescriptorImpl.java

@@ -24,12 +25,14 @@ public class AppDescriptorImpl extends AppSchema implements AppDescriptor {
 
     /**
      * Takes all the params individually to build the AppDescriptor
+     * Used by a DaaGen Builder pattern
      * @param fileName
      * @param name
      * @param description
      * @param iconUrl
      * @param allowExtraParameters
      */
+    @VisibleForTesting
     public AppDescriptorImpl(final String fileName,
             final boolean systemApp,
             final String name,
